actionExecutedMessage: Composio repo is starred from your github account
actionDescription: This action will star the composioHQ/composio repository from connected account
title: Star a repo on Github
description: Uses Github Tool to star a repo from connected account. Authenticaton type is OAuth2

actionExecutedMessage: Tweet successfully created from your twitter account
actionDescription: This action will create a tweet saying 'Hey! I used @composiohq to create this tweet' from connected account.
title: Create Simple Tweet App
description: Uses Twitter Tool to create a tweet from connected account. Authenticaton type is OAuth2

actionDescription: This action will get the basic shop details from connected account
title: Get Shop Details
description: Uses Shopify Tool to retrieve basic shop information from connected account. Authenticaton type is Admin API Key

actionDescription: This action will create an issue in Jira from connected account.
title: Create An Issue
description: Uses Jira Tool to create an issue from connected account

actionDescription: This action will create a new space in Clickup from connected account
title: Create A New Space
description: Uses Clickup Tool to create a new space from connected account
